casebody.data:
PAN-AMERICAN HIDE COMPANY, Inc., Libelant-Appellee, v. FIREMEN'S FUND INSURANCE COMPANY, Respondent-Appellant. (Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. May 21, 1926.) No. 357. Bigham, Englar & Jones, of New York City (D. Roger Englar, Henry B. Potter, and Ezra G. Benedict Fox, all of New York City, of counsel), for appellant. Duncan & Mount, of New York City (Joseph K. Inness, of New York City, of counsel), for appellee.

Before ROGERS, MANTON, and HAND, Circuit Judges. '

PER CURIAM.

Decree affirmed.
